name: Charlie Morgan
story: Rhys Parker grew up in a military family, with both his father and grandfather serving in various branches of the military. He always knew he wanted to follow in their footsteps, and joined the army as soon as he was old enough. Rhys has quickly adapted to military life and enjoys the challenges it brings, thriving in high-pressure situations. He loves being part of a team and excels in his role as an autorifleman.
